sense.gloss: stretching (one's body, e.g. when waking up)
elongation, extension, carry (e.g. of sound), sustain
to stretch, to extend, to lengthen, to grow (of hair, height, grass, etc.)
to straighten out, to be flattened, to become smooth
to stretch out (e.g. of a hand), to extend
to lose elasticity, to become slack, to become soggy (e.g. noodles)
to make progress, to develop, to expand, to increase, to improve
to be exhausted, to be groggy, to pass out, to collapse
to be prolonged (meeting, life span, etc.), to be extended (e.g. deadline), to lengthen (e.g. of the days)
to be postponed, to be delayed, to be put off
to lengthen, to extend, to stretch
to reach out, to hold out
to strengthen, to develop, to expand
standing on tiptoe and stretching one's back to make oneself taller, stretching oneself
overreaching oneself, overstretching oneself, trying to do something beyond one's ability, pushing to the limit
comfortably, peacefully, freely, with one's mind at ease, unrestrained, calmly, without worries, relaxed, carefree
to hold out, to extend (e.g. one's hands), to stretch, to reach out for
bending and stretching, flexing and extending
to be sluggish, to make little progress, to show little growth, to fail to improve, to level off, to not grow as much as expected
to delay (e.g. the end of a meeting)
sudden rise (esp. of stock prices), jump
to lay out (a futon), to make (bed), to spread out, to stretch, to widen
to lean over (someone), to bend over, to lean on
to weigh on one, to bear (heavily) on one, to lie on one
to rise (to a high position), to work one's way up, to push one's way up, to be promoted
to stretch, to extend, to lengthen, to spread
to gain influence, to become stronger, to increase (e.g. in scope)
to go further, to extend one's journey
to smooth out, to roll out, to spread out (something folded)
to knock out, to knock down
to stretch, to reach to, to stand on tiptoe
elastic, flexible, telescoping, expandable, retractable, extensible
to keep alive on, to stretch food to make ends meet
win or lose, sink or swim, make or break, all or nothing
growth period, period of rapid growth
to lend a hand, to give a hand, to help, to extend a helping hand

sdata.j: ↑学生↑↓がくせい↓↑達↑↓たち↓は↑英語↑↓えいご↓の↑力↑↓ちから↓を↑伸↑↓の↓ばしている。
sdata.e: The students are making good progress in English.

sdata.j: ↑夏↑↓なつ↓には↑草↑↓くさ↓がよく↑伸↑↓の↓びる。
sdata.e: Grass is luxuriant in summer.

sdata.j: ↑価格↑↓かかく↓が↑下↑↓さ↓がったので↑輸入↑↓ゆにゅう↓↑車↑↓しゃ↓への↑需要↑↓じゅよう↓が↑伸↑↓の↓びている。
sdata.e: Demand for imported cars is increasing due to lower prices.

sdata.j: ↑右腕↑↓みぎうで↓を↑伸↑↓の↓ばせません。
sdata.e: I can't stretch my right arm.

sdata.j: ↑引↑↓ひ↓き↑伸↑↓の↓ばしをしてほしかった↑写真↑↓しゃしん↓は、いつできるのですか。
sdata.e: When will they have that picture ready that I wanted to get blown up?

sdata.j: ↑委員↑↓いいん↓↑会↑↓かい↓の↑目的↑↓もくてき↓は↑子供↑↓こども↓の↑音楽↑↓おんがく↓の↑才能↑↓さいのう↓を↑伸↑↓の↓ばすことにあります。
sdata.e: The purpose of the committee is to develop children's musical talent.

sdata.j: わが↑社↑↓しゃ↓も↑設立↑↓せつりつ↓↑以来↑↓いらい↓よく↑伸↑↓の↓びたもんだ。
sdata.e: Our company has come a long way since it was set up.

sdata.j: もう↑髪↑↓かみ↓を↑切↑↓き↓ってもらってもいい↑時↑↓とき↓ですよ。↑大分↑↓だいぶ↓↑伸↑↓の↓び↑過↑↓す↓ぎていますよ。
sdata.e: It's high time you had your hair cut; it's grown too long.

sdata.j: トムは↑口髭↑↓くちひげ↓を↑伸↑↓の↓ばしている。
sdata.e: Tom is growing a mustache.

sdata.j: それから、↑脚↑↓あし↓を↑伸↑↓の↓ばして、↑座席↑↓ざせき↓にゆったりともたれかかった。
sdata.e: Then he stretched his legs and settled back in his seat.

sdata.j: その↑猫↑↓ねこ↓は↑道↑↓みち↓に、↑手足↑↓てあし↓を↑伸↑↓の↓ばして↑横↑↓よこ↓たわっていた。
sdata.e: The cat lay at full length on the road.

sdata.j: その↑男↑↓おとこ↓の↑子↑↓こ↓はあくまでも↑髪↑↓かみ↓の↑毛↑↓け↓を↑伸↑↓の↓ばすことにこだわった。
sdata.e: The boy persisted in wearing his hair long.

sdata.j: その↑少年↑↓しょうねん↓はもう↑一↑↓ひと↓つのケーキを↑取↑↓と↓ろうと↑手↑↓て↓を↑伸↑↓の↓ばした。
sdata.e: The boy reached out for another piece of cake.

sdata.j: その↑子↑↓こ↓は↑母親↑↓ははおや↓の↑方↑↓ほう↓に↑手↑↓て↓をいっぱいに↑伸↑↓の↓ばした。
sdata.e: The child stretched out his hand to his mother.

sdata.j: そのわかい↑男↑↓おとこ↓が↑手↑↓て↓を↑差↑↓さ↓し↑伸↑↓の↓べたのでわたしはそれを↑握↑↓にぎ↓った。
sdata.e: The young man put out his hand and I shook it.

sdata.j: ジャックは↑棚↑↓たな↓の↑上↑↓うえ↓の↑雑誌↑↓ざっし↓を↑取↑↓と↓ろうと↑手↑↓て↓を↑伸↑↓の↓ばした。
sdata.e: Jack reached out for the magazine on the shelf.

sdata.j: この↑道路↑↓どうろ↓は↑海岸↑↓かいがん↓まで↑伸↑↓の↓びている。
sdata.e: This road extends to the coast.

sdata.j: この↑通↑↓とお↓りは↑真↑↓ま↓↑北↑↓きた↓に↑伸↑↓の↓びている。
sdata.e: This street runs due north.

sdata.j: この↑生地↑↓きじ↓は↑引↑↓ひ↓っ↑張↑↓ぱ↓るとすぐ↑伸↑↓の↓びる。
sdata.e: This material stretches easily.

sdata.j: この↑水着↑↓みずぎ↓は↑伸縮↑↓しんしゅく↓↑性↑↓せい↓のある↑素材↑↓そざい↓でできている。
sdata.e: This swimming suit is made of elastic material.

sdata.j: このセーターは↑伸↑↓の↓びてすっかり↑型↑↓かた↓↑崩↑↓くず↓れしている。
sdata.e: This sweater is all stretched out of shape.

sdata.j: うちの↑息子↑↓むすこ↓は↑去年↑↓きょねん↓↑身長↑↓しんちょう↓が５インチ↑伸↑↓の↓びた。
sdata.e: My son grew 5 inches last year.

sdata.j: あつかましいその↑子↑↓こ↓は↑私↑↓わたし↓のひざの↑上↑↓じょう↓に↑両足↑↓りょうあし↓を↑伸↑↓の↓ばした。
sdata.e: The impudent child extended her legs across my lap.

sdata.j: ↑３↑↓さん↓↑人↑↓にん↓のうちの↑１人↑↓ひとり↓が↑芝刈↑↓しばか↓り↑機↑↓き↓で↑私↑↓わたし↓の↑庭↑↓にわ↓を↑大雑把↑↓おおざっぱ↓にさっと↑刈↑↓か↓り、もう↑一人↑↓ひとり↓が↑妻↑↓つま↓の↑庭↑↓にわ↓の↑端↑↓はし↓の↑伸↑↓の↓びた↑雑草↑↓ざっそう↓をさっと↑２↑↓に↓、↑３↑↓さん↓↑回↑↓かい↓↑刈↑↓か↓り、↑残↑↓のこ↓りの↑一人↑↓ひとり↓はトラックに↑上↑↓あ↓がってタバコをすっていた。
sdata.e: While one of them sped around major parts of the property on the mower, a second made a few sweeps at some tall weeds on the edge of my wife's garden, and the third got into the truck and smoked a cigarette.

sdata.j: ↑後↑↓うし↓ろの↑列↑↓れつ↓の↑人々↑↓ひとびと↓はステージを↑見↑↓み↓るために↑首↑↓くび↓を↑伸↑↓の↓ばした。
sdata.e: People in the back row craned to see the stage.

sdata.j: ↑国民総生産↑↓こくみんそうせいさん↓の↑伸↑↓の↓びはまったく↑遅↑↓おそ↓いペースです。
sdata.e: The GNP has been growing at a snail's pace.

sdata.j: ↑腰↑↓こし↓が↑伸↑↓の↓ばせません。
sdata.e: I can't straighten out my back.

sdata.j: ↑最近↑↓さいきん↓の↑研究↑↓けんきゅう↓によれば、↑日本人↑↓にっぽんじん↓の↑平均↑↓へいきん↓↑寿命↑↓じゅみょう↓はまだ↑伸↑↓の↓びているそうだ。
sdata.e: According to a recent study, the average life span of the Japanese is still increasing.

sdata.j: ↑雑草↑↓ざっそう↓は↑花↑↓はな↓より↑伸↑↓の↓びてしまいます。
sdata.e: Weeds will soon outgrow the flowers.

sdata.j: ↑産業↑↓さんぎょう↓の↑伸↑↓の↓び↑率↑↓りつ↓には↑驚↑↓おどろ↓きだ。
sdata.e: I'm amazed by the rate at which industries grow.
